snippet: As a serial winner Serena Williams has broken records without a backward glance throughout her career, but since September there is one milestone that has loomed ever larger in halting her progress toward the game's pantheon....
lead_paragraph: As a serial winner Serena Williams has broken records without a backward glance throughout her career, but since September there is one milestone that has loomed ever larger in halting her progress toward the game's pantheon.

headline.print_headline: Numbers Game Keeps Record-Chasing Serena on Edge
headline.main: Numbers Game Keeps Record-Chasing Serena on Edge
